name: The White House of Helsinki
description:
Infiltrate the White House of Helsinki and discover the secrets of the shady politicians. Post their secrets on social media one secret at a time and make the politicians hide from society forever.

Use WASD/arrow keys to move and spacebar to enter the victim's brain.

Minjutin:Producer, programmer, technical artist

vauhikas: Lead 2D artist, lead writer, researcher

Randomlollis: 3D modeler, character designer, writer, composer, environment designer, 2D artist
